about_the_game:
Do you like making levels and maps in the Half-Life Goldsource engine?
Curious how Half-Life: C.A.G.E.D.'s levels were designed?

Get the level design source files for Half-Life: C.A.G.E.D.!

Included in this download:



  • .RMF Hammer level editor source files.
  • .WAD Texture files.
  • .RAD Lighting radiosity settings.

Installs directly to your Half-Life: C.A.G.E.D. Steam directory.
Sub-Folder: \dlc_caged_fgs

name: Half-Life: C.A.G.E.D. - Level Design Source Files

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP
  • Processor: 500 mhz processor
  • Memory: 96 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 32mb video card
  • Storage: 40 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Potato acceptable.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows XP
  • Processor: 1000 mhz+ processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 128mb+ video card
  • Storage: 40 MB available space

short_description: Do you like making levels and maps? Do you want to know the secrets to squeezing the most out of Half-Life and the Goldsource engine? Then get the level design source files for Half-Life: C.A.G.E.D.!
